metadata.title: CVE-2024-0741 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An out of bounds write in ANGLE could have allowed an attacker to corruptmemory leading to a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 122, Firefox ESR < 115.7, and Thunderbird < 115.7.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-0741` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 122.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 122.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 122.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '122.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
